trans-unit.source: Provides a base implementation for caching a <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 提供用來快取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> 的基底實作。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" />, making deep copies of the object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> 的可修改複製，製作這個物件值的深層複製。

trans-unit.source: When copying the object's dependency properties, this method copies expressions (which might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製這個物件的相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製運算式 (但可能已不再解析)，但不會複製動畫或其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone (deep copy) of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> using its current values.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.CacheMode" /> 的目前值，建立它的可修改複製品 (深層複本)。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property is <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性仍為 <see langword="false" />。
